item.title: Android + IOIO + Laser Turret
item.description: Android and IOIO powered pan and tilt bracket with dual lasers. Pew pew! For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductory tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Input Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Output Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Input Background on Android development, IOIO, and electronics: Meet IOIO IOIO for Android Beginners Guide

item.title: Android + IOIO + Laser Tripwire
item.description: Laser tripwire with Android and IOIO. This article will demonstrate a proof of concept laser beam tripwire accessory. For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductory tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Input Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Output Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Input Background on Android development, IOIO, and electronics:
